題目: __________ of the man's blood showed he has been infected by the virus.
答對反饋: 答對了！正確答案是 Analysis.

題目: ___________ alcohol use can cause serious health problems.
答對反饋: 答對了！正確答案是 Excessive.

題目: Some studies have ___________ a link between music and learning in areas such as mathematics.
答對反饋: 答對了！正確答案是 Demonstrated.

題目: HIV patients can be seriously affected by ___________ related to minor illnesses.
答對反饋: 答對了！正確答案是 Complications.

題目: Driving when tired can be a(n) ___________ to yourself and others.
答對反饋: 答對了！正確答案是 Hazard.

題目: Although Delia had done a(n) ___________ amount of research
答案: she still hadn't begun writing her report.
答對反饋: Substantial
答錯回饋: 答對了！正確答案是 Substantial.

題目: Drinking too much alcohol certainly ___________ with putting on weight.
答對反饋: 答對了！正確答案是 Correlates.

題目: The nurse reminded the patient that the medicine cannot be taken ___________; it can only be applied to the skin.
答對反饋: 答對了！正確答案是 Internally.

題目: The singer has a(n) __________ vocal range that never fails to impress the audience.
答對反饋: 答對了！正確答案是 Astonishing.

題目: Our teacher always knows how to __________ discussion in the class.
答對反饋: 答對了！正確答案是 Stimulate.

題目: Be careful not to say anything negative about your old boss in the interview. That could __________ your chances of getting the job.
答對反饋: 答對了！正確答案是 Jeopardize.

題目: You said Todd would probably be late
答案: and it appears that your fears were __________.
答對反饋: Justified
答錯回饋: 答對了！正確答案是 Justified.

題目: There is nearly always some __________ cause for antisocial behavior in children.
答對反饋: 答對了！正確答案是 Underlying.

題目: Continued changes to the work schedule will __________ confusion among the employees.
答對反饋: 答對了！正確答案是 Result in.
答錯回饋: 不對，正確答案是 Result in.

題目: Alan finds jogging difficult as he has a __________ back injury.
答對反饋: 答對了！正確答案是 Chronic.

題目: A balanced diet is clearly __________ with good health.
答對反饋: 答對了！正確答案是 Associated.

題目: The boy ________ through a bunch of people and found his mom in the front row.
答對反饋: 答對了！正確答案是 Squeeze.

題目: Social workers frequently have to deal with the ________ of drug abuse.
答對反饋: 答對了！正確答案是 Menace.

題目: Paper and printing are two important inventions that ________ in ancient China.
答對反饋: 答對了！正確答案是 Originated.

題目: Many tourists to London enjoy feeding the pigeons
答案: but locals consider the birds to be a ________.
答對反饋: Nuisance
答錯回饋: 答對了！正確答案是 Nuisance.

題目: Chinese people usually follow many ________ when visiting temples.
答對反饋: 答對了！正確答案是 Rituals.

題目: This product ________ three main parts that must be put together.
答對反饋: 答對了！正確答案是 Consists of.
答錯回饋: 不對，正確答案是 Consists of.

題目: Although our next-door neighbor is a rather ________ old man
答案: he is very kind and friendly.
答對反饋: Eccentric
答錯回饋: 答對了！正確答案是 Eccentric.

題目: Elephants are believed to have ________ wisdom in some cultures.
答對反饋: 答對了！正確答案是 Divine.

題目: Education systems should always seek to improve their ______.
答對反饋: 答對了！正確答案是 Practices.

題目: The artist's paintings ______ scenes of country life.
答對反饋: 答對了！正確答案是 Depict.

題目: My family always get together on special ______.
答對反饋: 答對了！正確答案是 Occasions.

題目: Victor doesn't like listening to pop music as he thinks it's too ______.
答對反饋: 答對了！正確答案是 Commercial.

題目: Watching real ______ ceremonies in Asia can be a fascinating experience for travelers.
答對反饋: 答對了！正確答案是 Religious.

題目: In the US
答案: the third Monday of January ______ the birthday of Martin Luther King
答對反饋: Jr.
提示: 答對了！正確答案是 Commemorates.

題目: Brazilian food is a ______ of European
答對反饋: and native cuisines.
提示: 答對了！正確答案是 Blend.

題目: There is a strong ______ between Amanda and her father.
答對反饋: 答對了！正確答案是 Resemblance.
